item.title: Limesurvey randomizing
item.description: It is kind of an odd problem. For the following pretty straight forward question: How do I randomise questions within a group in Limesurvey? It seems to be really hard to find an answer. With the help of JonasÂ I figured out that there is a randomisation option hidden in the ‘Advanced Settings’ section of a question. What you have to do is provide the same number (this is important) for each question in a group that you want to randomise.
